proposal.new.page.form.button.create.not: Your voting power is lower than the threshold for creating proposals ({proposalThreshold} {token}). If you already own the governance token, you must self-delegate it in the user menu first.
homepage.hero.title: Revolutionize Your
homepage.hero.subtitle: Join Homeowners DAO, the future of homeowners associations. Our decentralized platform empowers homeowners to collaborate, make decisions and take action on community projects and improvements. Our transparent governance model makes it easy to connect and make an impact on the place you call home.
homepage.hero.disclaimer: This app is part of the author‚Äôs master‚Äôs thesis, ‚ÄúPrototype Implementation of the Decentralised Autonomous Organisation Governance‚Äù, and contains fictitious data.
